::Shredder::

Shredder looks back at the other Destrons as they all flew away from 
the battle. Let the Maximals die, Shredder figured, they wern't much 
use anyways.

"Magmatron has returned and built a new base," Shredder says to the 
Destrons there, "He wants us to report there. What do you guys think?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Dachande, Vulois DID respond to them!  I posted it three 
times!  You are 
> the one not responding! Vulois explained to Dachande and Battera 
his new 
> plan.  He was going to return to the peace talks, but this time 
they'd all go 
> together to prevent mishaps.  He asked if they accepted.  Please 
respond to 
> me. I really want this to work out.
> 
> :::Starscream/Sideswipe/Torca/Ratchet/Falcon/Snare/The Destrocons:::
>  
> ::Starscream follows suit, arming his guns and aiming them at the 
bush::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe grins from ear to ear as he is finally able to see his 
opponent.  
> The smile immeadiatly disapeers from his face as he gets hit by the 
missle.  
> he fires 2 missles and 25 shots at Double Punch::
> ~~~~~
> ::Torca was hit by the missle, and gets hit by 2 stinger missles.  
He fired 9 
> nails at Double Punch, 8 at Injector, and 8 at Bumblebee::
> ~~~~~
> ::Ratchet was hit by 2 ion disks in the foot and 1 in the chest.  
he 
> transformed into beast mode, which had all the weapon benefits of 
robot mode, 
> only with better armor.  He raised his tusks and flapped open his 
ears, and 
> fired 15 shots from each gun and 2 tusk missles at Manterror::
> ~~~~~
> ::My Destrons hear Shredder's order.  they were releived, because 
if they 
> waited any longer the ship would prbably be collapsing around 
them!::
> Ramjet: ya dont have to tell me twice!
> ::They transform into beast and vehicle modes and fly after 
Shredder::
